tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE seat_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    seat_number INT,
    section VARCHAR(50),
    assignment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    seat_assignment_id INT,
    sale_date TIMESTAMP
);
